characterDescription:
Betha is one of the thieves that Veil encounters at the tavern, All's Alley, in Urithiru.
She quiets Ur down as he sputters after his 'knife' experience with Veil, then addresses her herself:

characterDetails.Appearance: She wears a havah, but without a safehand sleeve - instead, she wears a glove with the fingers brazenly cut off at the knuckles.
